name: Just Capital
slogan: No pitch decks. No cap tables. And no coffee:  just.capital
description: Grow your business without giving away equity or personal guarantees: Get up to £250k in 24 hours to spend on growth.

jobs.title: Ruby Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Who are we?
Just Capital is a well funded start up, building the future of revenue finance. We help businesses get access to growth capital fast and repay via a revenue share model without having to put their home on the line or loose equity. A true partnership. 
We integrate with a suite of live data points, so we can create an unfiltered view of a businesses performance- as and when it happens.
If you’re passionate about the craft and process of building an exciting product from the ground up and working with great people, you’ll fit right in.

What will you be doing?
We are looking for experienced Engineers to take on this greenfield opportunity. 
As a senior engineer, you will have the opportunity to set up the standards in how the development process works. As a product focused team, we trust each individual to be autonomous and work towards are shared goals. We are fully committed in supporting one another in any way possible.
•	Act as a champion that drives product ideas from start to completion: from research insights, to workflows all the way to front end.
•	Prototype ideas to quickly access viability, we don’t need anything perfect.
•	Iterate based on feedback from the whole team.
•	Work closely with the product team to ship ideas.
What skills and experience do I need?
We are looking for full stack engineers that have done this before.
•	Currently Ruby house but as its greenfield happy with Javascript, React.js, Python etc
•	An appreciation of the entire product development process, from problem solving through to front end.
•	The ability to quickly built MVPs
•	Excellent communicator that can articulate the thought behind proposals.
•	Able to collaborate with the risk team and the wider company on strategy and delivery.
•	Frontend: our design system is built with Ruby, JavaScript and Sass CSS
•	Infrastructure: Heroku, AWS

Where will I be working from?
Normally you will be working from our WeWork, Old Street Offices but we are a remote friendly bunch so you can adjust your schedule as you see fit.

What would I be paid?
Our pay is within the top 10% of the industry, for the matched role and experience, based on London rates. 
Salary is not everything. Our benefits are all aimed at supporting a life well lived away from work. We don't offer free beers or Coke on tap but rather:
•	25 days off per annum plus bank holidays.
•	35 hours / week. Normal working hours are between 10am – 6pm.
•	Flexibility on daily hours and working from home. If you prefer to come to the office everyday that’s great, if you prefer to work from home a couple of times a week that’s fantastic. Whatever works for you. As a team we will make sure you are not missing out by pushing remote first practices. Flexibility to adjust your daily hours. Visiting friends and family in another country, going to the bank or the gym, you only need to have an overlap between our core hours (12am – 4pm) for 6 hours. As an example, you can start at 8am and finish at 4pm or 12am and finish at 8pm.

If you are interested in hearing more please contact Josh, our internal recruitment partner at talent@just.capital
